scripts.build-win: npx tsc && npx nexe dist/index.js -t windows-x64-14.15.3 -o dist/spireTranspiler.exe
scripts.build-linux: npx tsc && npx nexe dist/index.js -t linux-x64-14.15.3 -o dist/spireTranspiler
scripts.build-macos: npx tsc && npx nexe dist/index.js -t mac-x64-14.15.3 -o dist/spireTranspiler
